hotels.title: Elegant Villach City Retreat Overlooking the River Drau and Surrounding Mountains
hotels.description: Overlooking the tranquil waters of the River Drau and its magnificent surrounding mountains, voco Villach, an IHG Hotel, offers a stylish city retreat with a touch of nature. Enjoy mouthwatering morsels on the riverside at the hotel’s onsite restaurant, or unwind entirely with a massage and sauna at the spa. When you're ready to venture out of the hotel, Villach's town centre has a collection of boutique stores and galleries to lose yourself in, all the surrounded by those gorgeous mountain views.
